oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kluane Lake Moorings Temperature Data
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McKnight, Ellorie
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Raw temperature data from Kluane Lake moorings. The first sheet in the .xlsx file contains metadata such as names and locations of the moorings, data date range, logger type and accuracy, and any other relevant information., The other sheets in the workbook represent the actualy raw temperature data for each mooring, ordered by date.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
